**Example**

```esql
TS k8s
| WHERE pod == "three"
| STATS max_deriv = MAX(DERIV(network.cost)) BY time_bucket = BUCKET(@timestamp,5minute), pod
```

| --- | --- | --- |

| 0.038026 | 2024-05-10T00:05:00.000Z | three |
| -0.0197 | 2024-05-10T00:10:00.000Z | three |
